item.title: Massive wildfire in central California threatens homes, injures 3 people as it burns out of control

item.title: Driver trying to set record at Utah’s Bonneville Salt Flats dies after losing control
item.description: A driver trying to set a speed record during a racing event at Utah’s famed Bonneville Salt Flats died after losing control of his vehicle
